descriptionsByVersion.v1.3:
Adds eleven new guns to Rimworld from Synthetik.

Liandry Rail Gun: A high powered burst rifle that can fire through walls and set objects on fire.

M32 Multi Purpose: Whats better than throwing a grenade? Launching 6 grenades in the (general) direction of your enemies!

Kaida Medic ACR-X: An upgrade to the standard assault rifle, that improves the user's healing factor and medical speed.

Pressurised Impaler: A short range pneumatic shotgun that fires armour piercing stakes.

P9000 Supernova: A very fast firing laser submachine gun.

X512 Experimental: A heavy experimental assault rifle that fires slow homing projectiles.

R2000 'Sour' DMR: An accurate upgrade for the bolt action rifle, which prints money every time it fires.

Nemesis Prototype: A late game upgrade to the sniper rifle that fires Ultra Velocity projectiles which easily ignore armour and destroy walls.

HIG-S Particle Cannon: An energy rifle that fires exotic energy rounds that detonate on impact and shred unarmoured enemies.

Gladiator: An air cooled minigun that allows for much easier mobility compared to traditional miniguns.

VICIATOR ULTRA: A heavy shotgun that grants swifter movement.


Requires JecsTools. (https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=32868.0)

Synthetik is an awesome top-down shooter game, you can grab it here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/528230/SYNTHETIK_Legion_Rising/
